typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{$dtid} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		EMT as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		ProcessStartTm as string,
		ProcessCycleTm as string,
		X_load as string,
		Y_load as string,
		Z_load as string,
		A_load as string,
		S_RPM as string,
		Feed as string,
		AxisangleX as string,
		AxisangleY as string,
		AxisangleZ as string,
		AxisangleA as string,
		Toolset as string,
		EventTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> srccncstatus
srccncstatus sink(input(
		{$dtId} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		EventTime as string,
		AxisangleA as string,
		AxisangleZ as string,
		Z_load as string,
		ProcessStartTm as string,
		Y_load as string,
		AxisangleX as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		Toolset as string,
		X_load as string,
		S_RPM as string,
		ProcessCycleTm as string,
		EMT as string,
		Feed as string,
		AxisangleY as string,
		A_load as string,
		SequentialNumber as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['partition-data.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		{$dtId} = {$dtid},
		{$timestamp},
		S_TE,
		CreateTime,
		ActualSpeedY,
		ActualSpeedA,
		Cuttingfluid,
		S_Temp,
		EMT,
		ActualSpeedX,
		RateJOG,
		FastmoveTmC,
		RateFastmove,
		EventTime,
		S_Gap,
		RateHAND,
		CuttingSpeed,
		AbsPos,
		ActualSpeedZ,
		SequentialNumber,
		Mcode,
		ServoTemp,
		Fastmovespeed,
		MachPos,
		S_Torque,
		Distance,
		S_Load,
		RelPos
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PartitionDataSetCDM
